snippet: The decision to shutter the college, a women’s liberal arts school in Virginia, has stunned students, teachers and alumnae, some of whom are rallying to try to save it.
abstract: Decision by board of Sweet Briar College to close 114-year-old school has sparked backlash of anger and activism, with alumnae group planning to demand that college make its finances public or face lawsuit; furor surrounding decision is occurring even as future of similar small liberal arts women's colleges has become increasingly uncertain, particularly in rural areas, as they face certain challenges in recruiting.
lead_paragraph: The decision to shutter the college, a women’s liberal arts school in Virginia, has stunned students, teachers and alumnae, some of whom are rallying to try to save it.

headline.main: Anger and Activism Greet Plan to Shut Sweet Briar College
